name: js/index.js
process
description: Asynchronously extract nodes from a string.

return.description: Promise for a string with the extracted nodes.

name: processSync
description: Synchronously extract nodes from a string.

name: js/lib/extract-node-recursively.js
extractNodeRecursively
description: Whiteliste a node if it (or one of the nodes parents) matches the given filter.

return.description:
Returns true if the node (or one of its parents) matches one or more
  filter groups and false if not.

name: js/lib/filter-definitions.js
js/lib/node-matches-filter.js
nodeMatchesFilter
description: Check if a node matches the given filter.

return.description: Returns true if the node matches the filter and false if not.

name: js/lib/postcss-node-extract.js
postcssNodeExtract
description: A PostCSS plugin for extracting nodes from CSS code.

params.name: filterNames
params.description: Multiple filter names as array or a single filter name as string.
